channel.title: TripFLIX Tours
channel.itunes:author: TripFLIX LLC
channel.itunes:subtitle: Family friendly walking tours featuring themed adventures around the world.
channel.itunes:summary: TripFLIX Tours highlight a city's attractions around a theme that represents that city's character and charm. Upcomming tours include: New York's Holiday Windows, A Ganster's Guide to Chicago and Ben Franklin's Philadelphia.

item.title: TripFLIX NYC Holiday Windows 2005
item.itunes:author: TripFLIX LLC
item.itunes:subtitle: Midtown Manhattan's world-renowned holiday window displays.
item.itunes:summary:
New York's famed window designers reveal stories, themes, history and other secrets as they present their 2005 Christmas holiday window displays. This tour features the following sites in New York City's famed shopping district:
Bloomingdales at 60th and Lexington Bergdorf Goodman at 58th and Fifth Avenue The Disney Store at 55th and Fifth Avenue The NBA Store at 52nd and Fifth Avenue Sacks Fifth Avenue at 49th and Fifth Avenue Lord & Taylor at 39th and Fifth Avenue Macy's Herald Square at 34th and Broadway
item.itunes:keywords: Christmas, holiday, shopping, windows, displays, toys, gifts, New York, NYC, 5th avenue, macys, walking tour, tour, Hanukkah, Hanukah, Chanukah, Chanuka, 2005, TripFLIX
